The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY, et al. 18PA19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2019 Robert R. Marcus, Attorney at Law, Kimberly Sullivan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Matthew Nis Leerberg, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, Brian M. Rowlson, Attorney at Law, Jonathan E. Schulz, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authority d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System and CMCNortheast. R. Kent Brown, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Robert E. Zaytoun, Attorney at Law, Matthew D. Ballew, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Savino, Anthony Lawrence (The Estate of). Jon Ryan Moore, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. Paige L. Pahlke, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. John R. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Raleigh. Matthew W. Krueger-Andes, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. Burton Craige, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Trisha S. Pande, W. Ellis Boyle, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice

Amended

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion for Extension of Time to File Appellant Briefs filed on the 29th of May 2019 by the Parties: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of May 2019." Appellants shall have up to and including the 15th day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. Davis, J. recused
